entry.title: Euruko 2024 and My Feelings
entry.summary: Hello! I am still working professionally with the Ruby programming language, which I first started in 2011. I love the community as much as the language itself, and I am always proud to be a part of this community. I also try to organize people and do things on my own. Additionally, I enjoy getting together with other people who are devoted to the Ruby programming language, spending time with t...

entry.title: The First International Conference Experience
entry.summary:
Hello! I attended Balkan Ruby 2024. I had never attended any conferences abroad. This was my first abroad conference, and I was very excited. I chose to attend Balkan Ruby as it was held in Sofia, and Bulgaria is very close to Turkey - just an hourâ€™s flight away. I also appreciate their culture as it closely resembles ours in terms of history. Additionally, I had never been to Sofia before.
I ...
